alert.note: Alert for Johnston; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 12 at 7:58PM EDT until September 12 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Wake County in central North Carolina... Northern Johnston County in central North Carolina... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 758 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Garner, or 12 miles south of Raleigh, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Garner, Clayton, Zebulon, Knightdale, Wendell, Emit, Flowers and Lake Benson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
